messages.content: ComfyUI-ClarityAI is a custom node for ComfyUI that integrates Clarity AI, a creative image upscaler, to upscale and enhance images to high resolution.
How can you install the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node?

You can install the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node by opening ComfyUI Manager, searching for Clarity AI, and installing the node. Alternatively, you can use the command 'git clone https://github.com/philz1337x/ComfyUI-ClarityAI' in the custom_nodes directory.
Where can you create an API key for ComfyUI-ClarityAI?
You can create an API key for ComfyUI-ClarityAI at https://clarityai.cc/comfyui.
How can you add the API key to the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node?

You can add the API key to the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node by setting the environment variable 'CAI_API_KEY' or by writing your API key to a 'cai_platform_key.txt' file in the ComfyUI-ClarityAI folder. You can also use the 'api_key_override' field, but it is not recommended for security reasons.
Why is it not recommended to use the 'api_key_override' field in ComfyUI-ClarityAI?
It is not recommended to use the 'api_key_override' field in ComfyUI-ClarityAI because you need to be careful to delete the api_key_override when sharing your workflow, as it may expose your API key.
What does the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node do to images?
The ComfyUI-ClarityAI node upscales and enhances images to high resolution using the Clarity AI creative image upscaler.
Can you share your workflow with the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node without exposing your API key?
Yes, you can share your workflow with the ComfyUI-ClarityAI node without exposing your API key by ensuring that you delete the 'api_key_override' field before sharing.
